Hi all :corgi-wave:
Does anyone know whether it’s possible to apply conditional to the template type?
If yes, what is the syntax of it?
For example,  `{% if templateType == "blog" %} … {%endif%}`

Thanks

I believe we return the templateType in the developer info (meaning it’s accessible in the page context). I don’t offhand have the variable name handy but will look into adding it to the HubL variables page.

Curious what’s your use-case?

<@UDK7MSQUE> - It's largely a case where they want to customize the theme at a code level but the original theme files aren't editable.  This way they can edit while also getting theme updates when they become available.
